dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, you know, I was just looking at this Forbes list for the highest-paid TV actresses, and, uh, it's pretty wild.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, you know, I was just looking at this Forbes list for the highest-paid T V actresses, and, uh, it's pretty wild.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Together, the world's 10 highest-paid TV actresses earned a combined $168.5 million between June 1, 2017, and June 1, 2018, up from $156.5 million in the same period last year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, yeah, the one about the architects? It's kind of... I mean, Sofia Vergara, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, yeah, the one about the architects? It's kind of... I mean, Sofia Vergara, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Sofia Vergara Her giant haul, which clocks in at 73% more than second-ranked Kaley Cuoco's $24.5 million, leads this year's ranking of the small screen's top earners.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah! Like, she's apparently this renowned architect, which I didn't even realize, and she's announced her retirement from designing skyscrapers.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah! Like, she's apparently this renowned architect, which I didn't even realize, and she's announced her retirement from designing skyscrapers.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Modern Family star reigns supreme thanks not only to her salary from her role on the hit ABC comedy but also to a slew of endorsements and lucrative licensing deals, which make up nearly half of her payday.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right? And she's still, um, the top earner! It's wild how she manages, like, a team 73% larger than Kaley Cuoco's.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? And she's still, um, the top earner! It's wild how she manages, like, a team seventy three percent larger than Kaley Cuoco's.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Sofia Vergara Her giant haul, which clocks in at 73% more than second-ranked Kaley Cuoco's $24.5 million, leads this year's ranking of the small screen's top earners.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Which is crazy because Kaley Cuoco only managed, what, $24.5 million in renovations? That's a big gap.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which is crazy because Kaley Cuoco only managed, what, twenty four point five million dollars in renovations? That's a big gap.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: By contrast, 95% of Cuoco's earnings can be attributed to her role on Big Bang Theory.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. But Sofia, I mean, her architectural prowess, it's not just from *Modern Family*, is it? She's got, like, the coffee makers and furniture stores too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. But Sofia, I mean, her architectural prowess, it's not just from Modern Family, is it? She's got, like, the coffee makers and furniture stores too.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Modern Family star reigns supreme thanks not only to her salary from her role on the hit ABC comedy but also to a slew of endorsements and lucrative licensing deals, which make up nearly half of her payday. Among them: coffee maker SharkNinja Coffee and furniture chain Rooms To Go.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, her manager said they focus on appealing to *Modern Family* viewers outside the show. Their endorsement department is a 'well-oiled machine,' apparently.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, her manager said they focus on appealing to Modern Family viewers outside the show. Their endorsement department is a well-oiled machine, apparently.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Our attention is on the people watching Modern Family and how to appeal to them outside of the show, too, Luis Balaguer, Vergaras manager and business partner, told Forbes in 2016. Our endorsement department is a well-oiled machine.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It really is! Meanwhile, Kaley Cuoco, 95% of her earnings came from *Big Bang Theory*. But then there was that whole internal revolt thing, you know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It really is! Meanwhile, Kaley Cuoco, ninety five percent of her earnings came from Big Bang Theory. But then there was that whole internal revolt thing, you know?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Cuoco and her male co-stars took a pay cut, from an estimated $1 million an episode to $900,000 an episode, in an effort to free up cash for ranking newcomers Melissa Rauch (No. 6, $12 million) and Mayim Bialik (No. 6, $12 million).

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, right! The crew took a pay cut, um, from a million to nine hundred thousand, just to fund Melissa Rauch and Mayim Bialik? That's... that's a big deal.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, right! The crew took a pay cut, um, from a million to nine hundred thousand, just to fund Melissa Rauch and Mayim Bialik? That's... that's a big deal.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Cuoco and her male co-stars took a pay cut, from an estimated $1 million an episode to $900,000 an episode, in an effort to free up cash for ranking newcomers Melissa Rauch (No. 6, $12 million) and Mayim Bialik (No. 6, $12 million).

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and *Big Bang Theory* is, like, in its final season now. So things are changing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and Big Bang Theory is, like, in its final season now. So things are changing.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: But she still makes plenty from the show, which is now in its final season.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: But then you have Ellen Pompeo, too, from *Grey's Anatomy*. She's also, like, building structures and designing the show, which is clever.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But then you have Ellen Pompeo, too, from Grey's Anatomy. She's also, like, building structures and designing the show, which is clever.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Playing Meredith Grey for 15 seasons on Shonda Rhimes' Grey's Anatomy has allowed her to negotiate for a hefty upfront fee, a cut of the backend and a producer fee on spinoff Station 19.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. And that quote from her? "When your face and your voice have been part of something that's generated $3 billion... you start to feel like, 'OK, maybe I do deserve a piece of this.'" That's powerful.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. And that quote from her? "When your face and your voice have been part of something that's generated three billion dollars... you start to feel like, 'O K, maybe I do deserve a piece of this.'" That's powerful.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: When your face and your voice have been part of something that's generated $3 billion for one of the biggest corporations in the world, you start to feel like, 'OK, maybe I do deserve a piece of this,' Pompeo told The Hollywood Reporter in January.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. It makes sense why she gets a cut of the backend and a producer fee on *Station 19*.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. It makes sense why she gets a cut of the backend and a producer fee on Station nineteen.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Playing Meredith Grey for 15 seasons on Shonda Rhimes' Grey's Anatomy has allowed her to negotiate for a hefty upfront fee, a cut of the backend and a producer fee on spinoff Station 19.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And, uh, Mariska Hargitay and Julie Bowen also made the top five. They're involved in the 'architectural world' too, but they skip endorsements.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And, uh, Mariska Hargitay and Julie Bowen also made the top five. They're involved in the architectural world too, but they skip endorsements.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Rounding out the top five are Law & Order: SVU's Mariska Hargitay (No. 4, $13 million) and Modern Family's Julie Bowen (No. 5, $12.5 million). Both forgo endorsements and instead make their cash on screen.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, they're all about that big screen cash flow. It's a different strategy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, they're all about that big screen cash flow. It's a different strategy.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Modern Family star reigns supreme thanks not only to her salary from her role on the hit ABC comedy but also to a slew of endorsements and lucrative licensing deals, which make up nearly half of her payday.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It really is. And get this, the top ten TV actresses, um, earned a combined $168.5 million. But they can't work on projects after June 1st, 2018? That's a weird contract clause.

dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Methodology All earnings estimates are from June 1, 2017, through June 1, 2018. Figures are pretax; fees for agents, managers and lawyers are not deducted.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, no more building after that date, I guess! And Claire Danes is back on the list, plus Rauch and Bialik are newcomers.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, no more building after that date, I guess! And Claire Danes is back on the list, plus Rauch and Bialik are newcomers.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Returning to the ranking is Homeland's Claire Danes (No. 9, $9 million), who last appeared on the list in 2014. Rauch and Bialik are the only newcomers this year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: With their pay boosted to half a mil an episode for *Big Bang Theory*, too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: With their pay boosted to half a mil an episode for Big Bang Theory, too.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Cast renegotiations saw their pay boosted to an estimated $500,000 an episode for the soon-to-conclude show.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Pretty sweet deal for their last season! But some dropped off, like Priyanka Chopra. Apparently, she just, uh, didn't want to build more buildings.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Pretty sweet deal for their last season! But some dropped off, like Priyanka Chopra. Apparently, she just, uh, didn't want to build more buildings.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Fewer parts led to a smaller salary for Chopra, who clocked $10 million in 2017.

dialogue_turns.text: Can you blame her? Designing skyscrapers sounds exhausting!
